events.title: Registration
events.description: Register to the hackathon and get your swag! Make sure to have your ID ready

events.title: Baggage check-in
events.description: Bring your baggage and we will store it for you

events.title: BSC Tour
events.description: Discover Barcelona Supercomputing Center in three batches of 30 minutes

events.title: Opening Talk
events.description: Introductory talk. Meet our sponsors and discover the prizes

events.title: Hacking Starts
events.description: Ready. Set. GO!

events.title: Dinner
events.description: Enjoy our first meal

events.title: Team Building
events.description: Looking for a team or new teammates?

events.title: [Talk] GitHub: Intro to Git
events.description: Learn Git with Abdulhakim Ajetunmobi & Pandelis Zembashis, GitHub Campus Experts

events.title: [Talk] InfoJobs: Kotlin, a modern language for modern times
events.description: Getting started with Kotlin easily with an expert from InfoJobs

events.title: [Talk] iThinkUPC: Getting started with iThinkUPC Challenge
events.description: Some doubts with their challenge? Join us to this intro talk

events.title: [Talk] Itequia: Let's make some music with Javascript
events.description: Delight you merging the wonderful world of music with programming

events.title: [Talk] Everis: Intro to Virtual Assistants
events.description: Learn about Virtual Assistants with this awesome talk

events.title: [Talk] Opentrends: Chat bot with Google Assistant
events.description: You will easily create a simple chat to solve some disease

events.title: [Talk] AWSEducate: Getting started with Serverless Architectures
events.description: An expert from AWS will give a brief overview of serverless services and some examples of serverless architectures

events.title: [Talk] API 101
events.description: Join Nicolas Grenié and learn whatever you need about APIs

events.title: Midnight Snacks
events.description: Feeling hungry? Come get some DIY yogurts

events.title: The Game starts
events.description: Hello dear Hacker

events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Come get some energizing breakfast

events.title: Showers
events.description: Don't forget to bring your towel

events.title: [Talk] Skyscanner: Intro to Skyscanner API
events.description: Discover how Skyscanner API works

events.title: [Talk] Vueling: Getting fast responses from massive databases
events.description: Tired of databases latency? This talk will save your day!

events.title: [Talk] ServiZurich: In memory processing pipelines running in the cloud
events.description: Get into cloud systems with Jose Luís Sánchez

events.title: [Talk] Sopra Steria: Getting started with Natural Language Processing
events.description: Join this talk and learn the first steps in NLP

events.title: Lunch
events.description: Come and get some delicious paella

events.title: [Talk] Organize your hackathon
events.description: Would you like to organize a hackathon? Come listen some of our experiences and tips. Don't be shy! We are here to help you!

events.title: Rubik Tournament
events.description: Show your skills solving Rubik cubes!

events.title: Dinner
events.description: PIZZA TIME

events.title: Slideshow Karaoke
events.description: A hackers favourite game. Are you ready to improvise?

events.title: Sticker Exchange
events.description: You give stickers, you receive stickers. Ez pz

events.title: Midnight Snack
events.description: It's been more than 24 hours. Get some sweet waffles to keep yourself motivated

events.title: EPIC NERF GUNS BATTLE
events.description: Come and play a HackUPC classic. Nerf guns, 2 teams, a full classroom. Will you miss it?

events.title: The Game ends
events.description: You lost

events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Come charge your energies for the last hours of hacking

events.title: Hack submissions
events.description: Submit your project in our Devpost!

events.title: Hacking ends
events.description: SUBMIT YOUR PROJECT BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE

events.title: Showers
events.description: Relax a bit before the demos start

events.title: Hack Demos
events.description: It's demo time!

events.title: Lunch
events.description: Come grab some frankfurts/bratswurts made by our awesome partners Leo Boeck

events.title: Closing Ceremony
events.description: And the winners are... Come watch the finalists and winners!
